title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4216.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4216.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations set forth the types of available assistance, evaluation-criteria, application and project process and related matters, including implementation
and administration of the urban and community revolving loan trust fund, under
the Urban and Community Development Program (the program). The program promotes
economic development in the State of New York by encouraging economic and
employment opportunities for the State's citizens and stimulating development
of communities and urban areas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4216.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
